value:
All of you in the Order of Heroes are
some of the most heroic souls I've
ever met. Very well done!

My liege is Lady Elise, finest rose of
Nohr! No evildoer will harm a single
petal of her floral excellence!

You patrol so fearlessly, while I...?
I can't go 10 paces without being
struck by dragon droppings!

I have terrible luck, friend. Maybe
if we patrol together, your
good luck will rub off on me.

My whole being aches for justice,
but my stomach? It aches
from something bad I ate.

I've come to deliver greetings from
$Nf!$k$pHa! And I fell on my chin only a
few times on the way!

This feeling! Such power! Such
justice!
At last, my training is paying off!
I thought fortune favored the bold...

Aha! More power! May it counter
my bad luck!

Evil has met its match! I am Arthur
of Nohr. My bad luck is legendary,
but my heroism, more so!

Ah, $Nu!
I wanted to tell you—the town is
abuzz about the Order of Heroes!$k$pTrue heroes set the gossips to
their work! Perhaps you should
adopt a new heroic pose!$k$pI've practiced a few, but every
time I try one out, I am struck from
above by wild-pegasus dung.$k$pDoes that happen to you as well?
No? Just me? Then you can pose
without worry!$k$pAnd don't worry about being
vulnerable to attack when posing.
I'll eliminate any villainous fiends!$k$pI will fight off any number of them,
my strength fueled by the flames
of our friendship!
とう！
そおれ！
ぬおっ！
Darn my luck!
No more holding back!
Justice strikes!
To victory!
Luck is against you!
Bad...luck!
HAHA
Never fear—Arthur is here!
You may think me a clumsy fellow. And, my friend, you are right!
Whoaaa! Banana peel, you are a slippery villain!
Haha! My chin is one of the great wonders of the world!
Do we not all strike a pose when victorious? I do! All heroes should!
Where is Lady Elise? I fear that I lost her when I fell into a swamp!
We will win, friend! For I am the bosom buddy of justice!
Hmm-hmm!
Onward!
Let's do this!
